sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Fighting intensifies between Kyiv and Moscow's forces along Ukraine's front lines with reported casualties on both sides of the border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Spanish women's football team coaching staff resign amid the controversy surrounding Federation chief Luis Rubiales.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Thousands gather on the National Mall in the U.S. Capitol to mark the 60th anniversary of the March on Washington and Martin Luther King's I Have a Dream speech.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: SpaceX ferries its latest batch of astronauts to the International Space Station for a six-month mission of scientific research and station maintenance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Kiev and Moscow's forces are both continuing to increase pressure in the Ukrainian city of Bakhmut and in the south of the country, while Russian attacks seem to be concentrating on the front line north-east of Kobyansk-Limon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It comes as UK defence intelligence suggests the Russian command will intensify its offensive in the region, meanwhile Ukraine has stepped up its use of drones as part of its counteroffensive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This after two people were reportedly killed in Russian strikes on a cafe in Podilny near Kupyansk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Moscow's air defenses claimed to have repelled a fresh drone attack on the capital, which forced the temporary shutdown of all three major airports serving the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It follows reports that Ukrainian drones crashed into a skyscraper in Moscow's business district on Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And in the Belgorod region, Russian authorities claim three civilians were killed by Ukrainian drones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The majority of the Spanish women's football team coaching staff resigned on Saturday, condemning the behavior of Spain's Football Federation chief Luis Rubiales after he kissed player Jenny Hermoso on the lips without her consent at the World Cup final.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This follows FIFA's announcement that they temporarily suspended the man earlier that same day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The body said Rubiales will be removed from his football duties for 90 days, pending the disciplinary proceedings opened against him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The former footballer, who has so far refused to resign, was also seen earlier in the stands grabbing his crotch in celebration while standing near Queen Letizia of Spain and Infanta Sofia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Despite mounting pressure, the Spanish Football Federation threatened to sue Hermoso for quote �lying and defamation�, along with 79 other female footballers who vowed to strike as long as Rubiales remained in office.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's been 60 years since the historic March on Washington where Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. pronounced his iconic � I have a dream speech.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On Saturday, as a precursor to the anniversary, thousands converged on the National Mall, saying the U.S. has yet to fulfill the reverend's hope as the country remains fractured by racial inequality.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Bernie's king, Martin Luther King Jr.'s daughter, visited his monument in the nation's capital to reflect on her parents' legacy and the challenges that still remain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We're living in a time when there's a younger generation who believes that my daddy's generation and those of us that came after didn't get enough done.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Freedom is never really won. You earn it and win it in every generation. Vigilance is the answer. On the 28th of August 1963, some 25,000 people converged on the Lincoln Memorial in what is still considered one of the greatest and most consequential racial justice and equality demonstrations in U.S. history. On Monday, President Joe Biden will meet with the 1963 organizers and the King family for the anniversary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: organizers and the King family for the anniversary. It's the latest crew of SpaceX astronauts being ferried to the International Space Station.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Early on Saturday, the capsule launched from the Kennedy Space Center, carrying NASA's Jasmine Mokhbelli, Denmark's Andreas Mogensen, Japan's Satoshi Furukawa and Russia's Konstantin Borisov.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The four will begin six months of scientific research and station maintenance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This marks the first U.S. launch where every seat on the spacecraft was occupied by a different country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's really an exciting moment, and of course also on behalf of ESA, I really would like to congratulate all our partners for having achieved this milestone and this wonderful launch.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Liftoff was originally set for Friday, but additional reviews of valves in the capsule's life support system delayed the process.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The countdown was almost halted again after the discovery of a small fuel leak in the thruster system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: NASA is set to send another person to space from Kazakhstan in mid-September, along with two Russian cosmonauts.
